mapper.update: update blog_user set u_email = #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_password = #{uPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_nickname = #{uNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_headpicture = #{uHeadpicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_sex = #{uSex,jdbcType=BIT}, u_phone = #{uPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_birthday = #{uBirthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, u_admin = #{uAdmin,jdbcType=BIT} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select u_id, u_email, u_password, u_nickname, u_headpicture, u_sex, u_phone, u_birthday, u_admin from blog_user where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select u_id, u_email, u_password, u_nickname, u_headpicture, u_sex, u_phone, u_birthday, u_admin from blog_user
